title: Wanda the Witch
description: Nothing ever stays quiet in Halloween Town. Through the hustle and bustle of daily life, the kids of Halloween Town always manage to find evil and save the day. In this fifth installment, Wanda the Witch knows something is wrong and evil lurks abound. It's up to Wanda and her friends to save the town. But can they do it? Find out in this charming, funny, colorfully illustrated and entertaining story by the number 1 best selling, award winning children's author, AmeliaPicklewiggle.
author: Amelia Picklewiggle
